biotools.summary: An automated pipe for reproducible RNA-seq analysis with the minimal efforts from researchers. You only need to provide the taxa name and the accession code of RNA-seq samples deposited in the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI).

bioschemas.name: BP4RNAseq
bioschemas.summary: An automated pipe for reproducible RNA-seq analysis with the minimal efforts from researchers. You only need to provide the taxa name and the accession code of RNA-seq samples deposited in the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI).
